Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.aggregation

Class ModifierBoostService<V>

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.services.aggregation.ModifierBoostService<V>
Type Parameters:
V - The type of value used for the modifier effects, such as Integer or Double.
@Service public class ModifierBoostService<V> extends Object
A service that is used to store and apply boosts to Modifier's values.

  • Field Details

    • modifierBoosts

      private final HashMap<ModifierSource,Number> modifierBoosts
      A HashMap that stores boosts that Modifier's with a matching ModifierSource by the value of Number.

    • logger

      private static final org.slf4j.Logger logger

  • Constructor Details

    • ModifierBoostService

      @Autowired public ModifierBoostService()

  • Method Details

    • addBoost

      public void addBoost(ModifierSource modifierSource, Number valueChange)
      A method that used to store boosts. Used by ModifierExpressionService if a Modifier ModifierTypes is "ADDITIONAL_CONTEXT_REQUIRED". The expression can call this method to store boosts for later application.
      Parameters:
      modifierSource - The type of modifier that the boost will be applied to. For example, ModifierSource.MUTATION_POSITIVE will apply the valueChange to all positive mutations.
      valueChange - The value that will be applied to the modifier. For example, a value of 1.25 will add an extra 25% bonus to the existing Modifier's effect.

    • clearBoosts

      public void clearBoosts()
      A method that is called to clear boosts stored in modifierBoosts. To be used after all calculation completions.

    • checkBoost

      public Map<ModifierTypes,Number> checkBoost(Modifier modifier)
      A method that checks the modifier's ModifierSource against modifierBoosts. If there is a matching key, the value will be applied to each effect.
      Parameters:
      modifier - The Modifier that the boosts will be applied to.
      Returns:
      A new HashMap with all boosts applied (if applicable).

    • modifyValue

      private Number modifyValue(Number baseValue, Number valueChange)
      A private method that converts the baseValue into a double to apply the boost, which then reverts it back to its original Class.
      Parameters:
      baseValue - The original value that will have the boost applied to.
      valueChange - The value boost.
      Returns:
      A new Number that has been modified to apply the boost.

    • round

      public double round(Double value)
      A method that rounds the value to the nearest two decimal points.
      Parameters:
      value - The value to be rounded.
      Returns:
      The rounded value.
